title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Chat with local LLMs from Python scripts or notebooks.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama. Use any local Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI). Features workspaces, RAG, multimodal chat.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Simple fluent API to chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, markdown rendering, history, and tab completion.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement inside VS Code with this extension.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain. Ingest PDFs and chat with them locally.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot powered by Ollama. Swap models in real time, share chats, export history.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama. Use local models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for Ollama: PDF Q&A, voice chat, function calling, Discord bot, Home-Assistant skill.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Native Nim client for Ollama. Statically compiled binaries with zero dependencies.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for Ollama. Strongly typed, async-first, with tokio and streaming support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks for Ollama with CUDA, ROCm, CPU-only variants.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama inside CI pipelines for LLM-based testing, summarization, or doc generation.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector, autoscaling and ingress.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama. GenServer-based with back-pressure and telemetry events.

title: ollama-rustico
summary: Lightweight Rust CLI for Ollama with completions, model management and TUI chat.
